## RootNode.getNodes() method

It returns an array of all descendants with bfs or dfs. 

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getNodes(): RootNode<T>[];
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[RootNode](./treex.js.rootnode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;\[\]

An array of all descendants
